QuestData.Title: Return to the Aldor
QuestData.Description: This book... I could use it to increase my power tenfold... No! It would end up corrupting my very soul, this I am sure of. Return to those who sent you here, $n.$B$BYou now have the means to stop Varedis. Wait until he manifests his demonic form through metamorphosis, at that point you will need to burn the book in his presence. That will be the only way you can deprive him of his power.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Exarch Onaala at the Altar of Sha'tar in Shadowmoon Valley.$B$BCompleting quests for the Aldor will cause your Scryers reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.RewardText: You bring this abomination of a book to this holy site? You'd better have a very good explanation, $N?
